resources.string: Calls from phone numbers not in your contacts will be blocked
Your contacts will not be shared with anyone.
%1$s will block calls from phone numbers not on your contacts list. In order to do this, the app needs permission to read your contact list. %2$s
%1$s cannot block calls from phone numbers not on your contacts list without permission to read your contacts. The app will request these permissions again. %2$s
